text: Both Sides of the Sky is a compilation album by Jimi Hendrix, released by Legacy Recordings and Experience Hendrix on March 9, 2018. The album includes recordings made with both the Jimi Hendrix Experience and the Band of Gypsys lineups, and features guest appearances from Stephen Stills, Johnny Winter and Lonnie Youngblood. It was the third release in a trilogy of posthumously released "archival recordings" compilation albums highlighted as intended for a follow-up to Electric Ladyland (1968), starting with Valleys of Neptune (2010), and preceded directly by People, Hell and Angels (2013). ==Track listing== All songs recorded at Record Plant Studios, except for "Sweet Angel" recorded at Olympic Studios. All tracks written by Jimi Hendrix, except where noted. ==Personnel== *Jimi Hendrix – guitar, vocals, bass guitar on track 11 *Billy Cox – bass guitar tracks 1, 2 & 4 - 7 & 12 *Buddy Miles – drums tracks 1, 2, 4 - 7, 11 & 12 *Mitch Mitchell – drums tracks 3, 8 - 10 & 13 *Noel Redding – bass guitar tracks 1, 3, 8 - 10 & 13 *Stephen Stills – vocals and organ on tracks 5 and 11 *Johnny Winter – guitar on track 8 *Lonnie Youngblood – vocals and saxophone on track 9 ==Charts== ===Weekly charts=== {| class="wikitable sortable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center" |- ! scope="col"| Chart (2018) ! scope="col"| Peak position |- ! scope="row"| Australian Albums (ARIA) | 20 |- |- |- |- |- |- |- |- |- ! scope="row"| Italian Albums (FIMI) | 59 |- ! scope="row"| New Zealand Albums (RMNZ) | 39 |- |- |- |- ! scope="row"| Spanish Albums (PROMUSICAE) | 21 |- ! scope="row"| Swedish Albums (Sverigetopplistan) Click on "Veckans albumlista". | 15 |- |- |- ! scope="row"| US Billboard 200 | 8 |} ===Year-end charts=== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center" |- ! scope="col"| Chart (2018) ! scope="col"| Position |- ! scope="row"| Belgian Albums (Ultratop Flanders) | 187 |} ==Notes== ==References== Category:Jimi Hendrix compilation albums Category:2018 compilation albums Category:Albums produced by Eddie Kramer Category:Legacy Recordings compilation albums Category:Compilation albums published posthumously
